channel.title: Donator shops ftw? [508]
channel.description: alright, how would I add a donator shop?? I was hoping I could use like.. a different form of money, like say.. fog tokens.. or something, and use those instead of coins.. but if there isn't a wway that anyone knows, I was wondering if anyone could teach me how to add a donator shop, using the same base as a pk point shop.. btw, my pk point shop, is set up in a different form than a reagular shop.. it is in the warning box tab thing.. whatever it's called.. and I was hoping someone could show me how to make it in an actual shop interface, using a point/token system.. any help?

alright, how would I add a donator shop?? I was hoping I could use like… a different form of money, like say… fog tokens… or something, and use those instead of coins…
but if there isn’t a wway that anyone knows, I was wondering if anyone could teach me how to add a donator shop, using the same base as a pk point shop… btw, my pk point shop, is set up in a different form than a reagular shop… it is in the warning box tab thing… whatever it’s called… and I was hoping someone could show me how to make it in an actual shop interface, using a point/token system… any help?
